options.content:
![svg image](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)


# Overall Cost per Provider

This dashboard shows the overall cost for the selected Provider(s).

targets.rawSql:
WITH vms_with_tags AS (
 SELECT DISTINCT ON (e.oid) 
 	e.oid AS vm_oid
  ,s.seed_oid as group_oid
 	,e.name AS vm_name
 	,(e.attrs -> 'num_cpus')::int as vcpus

 FROM entity e
   JOIN scope s ON (e.oid = s.scoped_oid)
 WHERE e.type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
   AND (s.start, s.finish)overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
   AND s.seed_oid in ($Group)
   )
select g.name as "Group Name"
      ,sum(stor_cap) AS "Storage Capacity"
      ,sum(stor_used) AS "Storage Used"
      ,sum(stor_free) AS "Storage Free"
      ,coalesce(sum(stor_cost),0) AS "Cost of Storage"
      ,sum(vcpus) AS "CPU Core #"
      ,sum(cpu_cap) AS "CPU Capacity (Mhz)"
      ,sum(cpu_used) AS "CPU Used (Mhz)"
      ,sum(cpu_free) AS "CPU Free (Mhz)"
      ,sum(cpu_cost) AS "Cost of vCPUs"
      ,sum(vmem_cap) AS "Memory Capacity"
      ,sum(vmem_used) AS "Memory Used"
      ,sum(vmem_free) AS "Memory Free"
      ,sum(vmem_cost) AS "Cost of vMem"
      ,sum(total_cost) AS "Total Cost"
from 
  (SELECT 
    vm_oid,
    group_oid,
    avg(metric.consumed/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED') as stor_cap,
    avg(metric.consumed/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_AMOUNT') as stor_used,
    (avg(metric.consumed) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED') - avg(metric.consumed) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_AMOUNT'))/1024 as stor_free,
    ${costStorage}*avg(metric.consumed/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED') stor_cost,
    vcpus,
    avg(metric.capacity) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VCPU') cpu_cap,
    avg(metric.current) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VCPU') cpu_used,
    (avg(metric.capacity) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VCPU')) - (avg(metric.current) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VCPU')) cpu_free,
    ${costvCPU}*vcpus cpu_cost, 
    avg(metric.capacity/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM') vmem_cap,
    avg(metric.current/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM') vmem_used,
    (avg(metric.capacity/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM')) - (avg(metric.current/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM')) vmem_free,
    ${costvMEM}*avg(metric.capacity/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM') vmem_cost,
    coalesce(${costStorage}*avg(metric.consumed/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED'),0)+${costvCPU}*vcpus+${costvMEM}*avg(metric.capacity/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM') total_cost
  FROM vms_with_tags
   JOIN metric ON metric.entity_oid = vm_oid
  WHERE metric."type" IN ('VMEM', 'VCPU', 'STORAGE_AMOUNT', 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED')
   AND $__timeFilter(metric."time")
  GROUP BY vm_oid, group_oid, vcpus) as a
  
join entity g on g.oid = a.group_oid
where g.type = 'GROUP'
 and (g.first_seen, g.last_seen) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
 and g.oid in ($Group)
 group by 1

;

panels.title: ðŸ’° Cost Breakdown per selected Provider

options.content:
![svg image](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)


# Individual VM Costs

This dashboard shows the cost details for the VMs of the selected Provider

targets.rawSql:
WITH vms_with_tags AS (
 SELECT DISTINCT ON (e.oid) 
 	e.oid AS vm_oid
 	,e.name AS vm_name
 	,(e.attrs -> 'num_cpus')::int as vcpus

 FROM entity e
   JOIN scope s ON (e.oid = s.scoped_oid)
 WHERE e.type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
   AND (s.start, s.finish) OVERLAPS (now() - interval '10 minute', now())
   AND s.seed_oid in ($Group)
   )
   
SELECT 
 vm_name AS "VM name",
 avg(metric.consumed/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED') AS "Storage Capacity",
 avg(metric.consumed/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_AMOUNT') AS "Storage Used",
 (avg(metric.consumed) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED') - avg(metric.consumed) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_AMOUNT'))/1024 AS "Storage Free",
 coalesce(${costStorage}*avg(metric.consumed/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED'),0) AS "Cost of Storage",
 vcpus AS "CPU Core #",
 avg(metric.capacity) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VCPU') AS "CPU Capacity (Mhz)",
 avg(metric.current) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VCPU') AS "CPU Used (Mhz)",
 (avg(metric.capacity) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VCPU')) - (avg(metric.current) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VCPU')) AS "CPU Free (Mhz)",
 ${costvCPU}*vcpus AS "Cost of vCPUs", 
 avg(metric.capacity/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM') AS "Memory Capacity",
 avg(metric.current/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM') AS "Memory Used",
 (avg(metric.capacity/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM')) - (avg(metric.current/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM')) AS "Memory Free",
 ${costvMEM}*avg(metric.capacity/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM') AS "Cost of vMem",
 coalesce(${costStorage}*avg(metric.consumed/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED'),0)+${costvCPU}*vcpus+${costvMEM}*avg(metric.capacity/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM') AS "Total Cost"
FROM vms_with_tags
JOIN metric ON metric.entity_oid = vm_oid
WHERE metric."type" IN ('VMEM', 'VCPU', 'STORAGE_AMOUNT', 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED')
 AND metric."time" BETWEEN now() - interval '10 minute' and now()
GROUP BY vm_name, vm_oid, vcpus
ORDER BY "CPU Core #" desc;

options.content:
![svg image](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)


# Usage Details

This dashboard shows the usage details for the selected provider and its VMs

targets.rawSql:
WITH vms_with_tags AS (
 SELECT DISTINCT ON (e.oid) 
 	e.oid AS vm_oid
  ,s.seed_oid as group_oid
 	,e.name AS vm_name
 	,(e.attrs -> 'num_cpus')::int as vcpus

 FROM entity e
   JOIN scope s ON (e.oid = s.scoped_oid)
 WHERE e.type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
   AND (s.start, s.finish)overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
   AND s.seed_oid in ($Group)
   )
select g.name as "Group Name"
      ,sum(stor_cap) AS "Storage Capacity"
      ,sum(stor_used) AS "Storage Used"
      ,sum(stor_free) AS "Storage Free"
      ,sum(stor_cost) AS "Cost of Storage"
      ,sum(vcpus) AS "CPU Core #"
      ,sum(cpu_cap) AS "CPU Capacity (Mhz)"
      ,sum(cpu_used) AS "CPU Used (Mhz)"
      ,sum(cpu_free) AS "CPU Free (Mhz)"
      ,sum(cpu_cost) AS "Cost of vCPUs"
      ,sum(vmem_cap) AS "Memory Capacity"
      ,sum(vmem_used) AS "Memory Used"
      ,sum(vmem_free) AS "Memory Free"
      ,sum(vmem_cost) AS "Cost of vMem"
      ,sum(total_cost) AS "Total Cost"
from 
  (SELECT 
    vm_oid,
    group_oid,
    avg(metric.consumed/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED') as stor_cap,
    avg(metric.consumed/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_AMOUNT') as stor_used,
    (avg(metric.consumed) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED') - avg(metric.consumed) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_AMOUNT'))/1024 as stor_free,
    ${costStorage}*avg(metric.consumed/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED') stor_cost,
    vcpus,
    avg(metric.capacity) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VCPU') cpu_cap,
    avg(metric.current) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VCPU') cpu_used,
    (avg(metric.capacity) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VCPU')) - (avg(metric.current) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VCPU')) cpu_free,
    ${costvCPU}*vcpus cpu_cost, 
    avg(metric.capacity/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM') vmem_cap,
    avg(metric.current/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM') vmem_used,
    (avg(metric.capacity/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM')) - (avg(metric.current/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM')) vmem_free,
    ${costvMEM}*avg(metric.capacity/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM') vmem_cost,
    ${costStorage}*avg(metric.consumed/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED')+${costvCPU}*vcpus+${costvMEM}*avg(metric.capacity/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM') total_cost
  FROM vms_with_tags
   JOIN metric ON metric.entity_oid = vm_oid
  WHERE metric."type" IN ('VMEM', 'VCPU', 'STORAGE_AMOUNT', 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED')
   AND $__timeFilter(metric."time")
  GROUP BY vm_oid, group_oid, vcpus) as a
join entity g on g.oid = a.group_oid
where g.type = 'GROUP'
 and (g.first_seen, g.last_seen) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
 and g.oid in ($Group)
 group by 1


;

WITH vms_with_tags AS (
 SELECT DISTINCT ON (e.oid) 
 	e.oid AS vm_oid
 	,e.name AS vm_name
 	,(e.attrs -> 'num_cpus')::int as vcpus

 FROM entity e
   JOIN scope s ON (e.oid = s.scoped_oid)
 WHERE e.type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
   AND (s.start, s.finish) OVERLAPS (now() - interval '10 minute', now())
   AND s.seed_oid in ($Group)
   )
   
SELECT 
 vm_name AS "VM name",
 avg(metric.consumed/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED') AS "Storage Capacity",
 avg(metric.consumed/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_AMOUNT') AS "Storage Used",
 (avg(metric.consumed) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED') - avg(metric.consumed) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_AMOUNT'))/1024 AS "Storage Free",
 ${costStorage}*avg(metric.consumed/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED') AS "Cost of Storage",
 vcpus AS "CPU Core #",
 avg(metric.capacity) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VCPU') AS "CPU Capacity (Mhz)",
 avg(metric.current) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VCPU') AS "CPU Used (Mhz)",
 (avg(metric.capacity) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VCPU')) - (avg(metric.current) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VCPU')) AS "CPU Free (Mhz)",
 ${costvCPU}*vcpus AS "Cost of vCPUs", 
 avg(metric.capacity/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM') AS "Memory Capacity",
 avg(metric.current/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM') AS "Memory Used",
 (avg(metric.capacity/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM')) - (avg(metric.current/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM')) AS "Memory Free",
 ${costvMEM}*avg(metric.capacity/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM') AS "Cost of vMem",
 ${costStorage}*avg(metric.consumed/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED')+${costvCPU}*vcpus+${costvMEM}*avg(metric.capacity/1024/1024) FILTER (WHERE metric.type = 'VMEM') AS "Total Cost"
FROM vms_with_tags
JOIN metric ON metric.entity_oid = vm_oid
WHERE metric."type" IN ('VMEM', 'VCPU', 'STORAGE_AMOUNT', 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED')
 AND metric."time" BETWEEN now() - interval '10 minute' and now()
GROUP BY vm_name, vm_oid, vcpus
ORDER BY "CPU Core #" desc;

list.definition:
SELECT distinct name as __text
               ,oid as __value
   from entity
Where type = 'GROUP'
and (first_seen, last_seen) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
and attrs -> 'member_types' ? 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
and (attrs -> 'origin' ? 'USER' OR 
   (attrs->'targets'->0->>'category' in ('Cloud Management','Hypervisor') and
   name like '%:standard%')
  )
list.label: Group Name
list.name: Group
list.query:
SELECT distinct name as __text
               ,oid as __value
   from entity
Where type = 'GROUP'
and (first_seen, last_seen) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
and attrs -> 'member_types' ? 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
and (attrs -> 'origin' ? 'USER' OR 
   (attrs->'targets'->0->>'category' in ('Cloud Management','Hypervisor') and
   name like '%:standard%')
  )

title: FINOPS - Virtual Machine Cost and Capacity with Groups
